property.name: Text
property.value: X equals the number of attachments in play. Forced: If the first player controls 3 or more attachments Incatasi will always engage then irrespective of threat. Forced: At the start of combat, the player engaged with Incatasi must discard an attachment on a character they control. If they can't they may not declare a defender for Incatasi this round. Forced: During the refresh step return Incatasi to the staging area if the player engaged with Incatasi controls no attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X equals the number of heroes with a Ì resource icon
Travel: Each players must discard 1 character to travel here.
Forced: While this is the active location you may not activate action or response effects on Ì cards nor may you play Ì cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X equals the number of heroes with a Ï resource icon
Travel: Deal 1 damage to each character to travel here.
Forced: While this is the active location you may not activate action or response effects on Ï cards nor may you play Ï cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X equals the number of heroes with a Î resource icon
Travel: Each players must discard 3 cards to travel here.
Forced: While this is the active location you may not activate action or response effects on Î cards nor may you play Î cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X equals the number of heroes with a Ê resource icon
Travel: The first player must exhaust a hero to travel here. Skip the refresh phase at the end of this round.
Forced: While this is the active location you may not activate action or response effects on Ê cards nor may you play Ê cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Remove Wilyador and Rhosgobel from the deck. Put the 4 Enchanted Groves and Incatasi into the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: Progress tokens may not be placed on Enchanted Grove locations in the staging area nor may they be placed on this quest unless each player controls a hero with Athelas attached. Forced: If a card targets Wilyador, the first player chooses a hero to be the target of that card instead.
You cannot complete this quest until you have 4 Enchanted Groves in your victory display. When you complete this quest you wake up and have won.
